tooltips.home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Only works in the overworld!
tooltips.advanced_home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Works across the overworld, nether and end!
tooltips.super_home_stone.shift.held: Shift right click in off hand to set location. Right click in main hand to teleport there! Works across all dimensions!
tooltip.advanced_home_stone.invalid_dime: Cannot be used in this dimension!
tooltips.death_stone.shift.held: Right click to return to your latest death point. Works across any dimension
tooltips.ender_scrambler.shift.held: Place down to prevent enderman from teleporting away!
tooltips.fan.shift.held: Place down to push entities in a certain direction!
tooltips.wallet.shift.held: With the wallet in your off hand, shift right click %s in your main hand to add them to your wallet! Right click to remove %s!
tooltips.wrench_item.shift.held: When held look at a block to see more information!
tooltips.floating_block.place_in_air: Place in the air or inside water!
tooltips.portable_gui.no_block: No Opolis Block in this location!
tooltips.portable_gui.in_spawn_chunk: Block in Spawn chunk, this will not work!
tooltips.portable_gui.no_gui: This block does not have a GUI/ doesnt work with the portable GUI!
tooltips.portable_gui.banned_block: This block is banned from the portable GUI!
tooltips.portable_gui.no_location: No position set for this location!
jei.opolisutilities.resource_generator:
§lResource Generator§r 

The Resource Generator is a one block solution to produce certain blocks!

Top slot is the block you want, Top right slot is for speed upgrades, Bottom is the output

JEI will show valid blocks that can be made as well as speed upgrades
jei.opolisutilities.fluid_generator:
§lFluid Generator§r 

The Fluid Generator is a one block solution to produce certain fluids!

Top slot is for a bucket, Top right slot is for speed upgrades, Left side is the tank

JEI will show valid fluids that can be made as well as speed upgrades

Fluids can be dumped by shift clicking on the tank!

This block will store its fluid when broken
jei.opolisutilities.floating_block:
§lFloating Block§r 

The Floating Block can be placed in the air with a supporting block
jei.opolisutilities.drying_table:
§lDrying Table§r 

The Drying Table can be used to dry items

Top slot is for the item to dry, Bottom is the output

This block can be waterlogged to create the Soaking Table

The Soaking Table makes items wet
jei.opolisutilities.item_repairer:
§lItem Repairer§r 

The Item Repairer can be used to repair items

Top slot is for the item to repair, Top right slot is for speed upgrades, Bottom is the repaired item
jei.opolisutilities.block_placer:
§lBlock Placer§r 

The Block Placer can be used to place blocks

Blocks/Items in the banned in block placer tag will not be able to be placed

Has adjustable tickrate for placing blocks, can be turned on and off
jei.opolisutilities.block_breaker:
§lBlock Breaker§r 

The Block Breaker can be used to break blocks

Left slot is for the tool, middle slot is the whitelist slot (only breaks that block), right slot is the blacklist slot (breaks every thing but that block)

Breaking speed is determined by the tool and the block

Can be turned on and off
jei.opolisutilities.portable_gui:
§lPortable GUI§r 

The Portable GUI is an item that can be used to access the GUI of any block (lol this doesnt work looool)

When held use Crouch and hold alt or ctrl to change between up to 5 locations, Shift right click on a valid block to set the location in the GUI, Right click to open that GUI

This item will not set gui locations if the block is in the banned from the Portable GUI tag
